programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes plays a half-mortal, half-immortal charged with ridding the earth of a race of vampires led by Stephen Dorff in this action-packed blockbuster.

programme.title: Blade 2
programme.desc: The sword-wielding Blade returns to fight the Reapers, a new race of super vampires hell-bent on annihilating all other vampires before destroying the entire human race.

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: The war between humans and vampires continues, but the humans' best hope, human-vampire hybrid warrior Blade (Wesley Snipes), has been framed for countless murders, turning popular sentiment against him. The vampire leader responsible for Blade's bad publicity is Danica Talos (Parker Posey), who's determined to finally lead her bloodthirsty compatriots to victory. Now Blade must team up with a band of rogue vampire hunters (Ryan Reynolds, Jessica Biel) to save humanity.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Follows Captain Alexei Vostrikov who, at the height of the Cold War, is ordered to take over command of the nuclear missile submarine K-19, pride of the Soviet Navy. His assignment: Prepare the K-19 for sea and take her out on patrol -- no matter what the cost. But problems with the K-19 arise that may lead to a core meltdown and explosion that will certainly kill all aboard, and possibly trigger a nuclear war. Vostrikov must choose between his orders and the lives of his men.

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: Akeelah, an 11-year-old girl living in South Los Angeles, discovers she has a talent for spelling, which she hopes will take her to the National Spelling Bee. Despite her mother's objections, Akeelah doesn't give up on her goal. She finds help in the form of a mysterious teacher, and along with overwhelming support from her community, Akeelah might just have what it takes to make her dream come true.

programme.title: Snakes On A Plane
programme.desc: A key witness to an execution must be flown from Hawaii to Los Angeles in order to testify in an organized crime case.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes plays a half-mortal, half-immortal charged with ridding the earth of a race of vampires led by Stephen Dorff in this action-packed blockbuster.

programme.title: Blade 2

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: John Tunstall (Terence Stamp), a distinguished British gentleman, employs downtrodden youths to tend his herd on the New Mexican frontier. When Tunstall is gunned down by the crooked Lawrence G. Murphy (Jack Palance), a ragtag group of cow hands -- including Doc Scurlock (Kiefer Sutherland), Richard Brewer (Charlie Sheen) and young William "Billy the Kid" Bonney (Emilio Estevez) -- ride forth in search of bloody vengeance for the death of their beloved mentor.

programme.title: Young Guns II
programme.desc: En route to Mexico from the United States, Billy the Kid (Emilio Estevez) and his associates are pursued by federal agents hell-bent on bringing them to justice. But when Billy, Doc (Kiefer Sutherland) and Chavez (Lou Diamond Phillips) prove too difficult to track down, the frustrated authorities enlist an old friend of theirs, reformed outlaw Pat Garrett (William Petersen), to take down the elusive gunslinger. But Billy has a head start, and his crew of outlaws is growing by the minute.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: Feisty Morgan Adams (Geena Davis) inherits her late buccaneer father's galleon and one-third of a map to buried treasure located on Cutthroat Island. The map had been tattooed on her father's scalp, and to find the treasure, she must locate and scalp his two brothers. But Morgan's swashbuckling uncle, Dawg Brown (Frank Langella), wants the treasure for himself, and does battle with his headstrong niece and her unwilling accomplice, Latin-speaking physician William Shaw (Matthew Modine).

programme.title: Blood and Money
programme.desc: A retired veteran (Tom Berenger) hunting in the Allagash backcountry discovers a dead woman with a duffle bag full of money. He soon finds himself in a web of deceit and murder.

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: When a group of dissatisfied settlers decides they've had enough of the Wild West, they hire James Harlow, an alcoholic wagon master, to take them back East. The eclectic but happy bunch includes Dr. Phil, prostitute Belle and openly gay man Julian. But the railroad investors don't want it getting out that the West isn't a nice place, so they do everything they can to make sure the group never makes it to their destination.

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: John Tunstall (Terence Stamp), a distinguished British gentleman, employs downtrodden youths to tend his herd on the New Mexican frontier. When Tunstall is gunned down by the crooked Lawrence G. Murphy (Jack Palance), a ragtag group of cow hands -- including Doc Scurlock (Kiefer Sutherland), Richard Brewer (Charlie Sheen) and young William "Billy the Kid" Bonney (Emilio Estevez) -- ride forth in search of bloody vengeance for the death of their beloved mentor.

programme.title: Young Guns II
programme.desc: En route to Mexico from the United States, Billy the Kid (Emilio Estevez) and his associates are pursued by federal agents hell-bent on bringing them to justice. But when Billy, Doc (Kiefer Sutherland) and Chavez (Lou Diamond Phillips) prove too difficult to track down, the frustrated authorities enlist an old friend of theirs, reformed outlaw Pat Garrett (William Petersen), to take down the elusive gunslinger. But Billy has a head start, and his crew of outlaws is growing by the minute.

programme.title: Love Sick: Secrets of a Sex Addict
programme.desc: This is the story of a married woman with a seemingly normal life.

programme.title: Amanda Knox: Murder on Trial in Italy
programme.desc: Based on the true story that captured international headlines.

programme.title: An Officer and a Murderer
programme.desc: A popular Canadian Air Force Officer is shockingly arrested.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Watts Family Tragedy
programme.desc: Includes exclusive never-before-seen footage and new interviews with Tammy Lee.

programme.title: Love Triangle Nightmare
programme.desc: Brittany is attending her "Divorce Party Weekend," and meets Jake.

programme.title: New: Family Pictures
programme.desc: Sylvie and Maggie are two strangers living on opposite coasts, with similar lives.

programme.title: Custody
programme.desc: Featuring Viola Davis, Ellen Burstyn. Three women's lives are changed when they cross paths at Family Court.

programme.title: Giving Hope: The Ni'cola Mitchell Story
programme.desc: A successful author, publisher and speaker realizes that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls.

programme.title: New: Family Pictures
programme.desc: Sylvie and Maggie are two strangers living on opposite coasts, with similar lives.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Having long-since abandoned his life as a lethal soldier, John Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) lives a solitary life near the Thai border. Two weeks after guiding a missionary (Julie Benz) and her comrades into Burma, he gets an urgent call for help. The missionaries have not returned and although he is reluctant to embrace violence again, Rambo sets out to rescue the captives from the Burmese army.

programme.title: Rambo: Last Blood
programme.desc: Vietnam War veteran John Rambo tries to find some semblance of peace by raising horses on a ranch in Arizona. He's also developed a special familial bond with a woman named Maria and her teenage granddaughter Gabriela. But when a vicious Mexican cartel kidnaps Gabriela, Rambo crosses the border on a bloody and personal quest to rescue her and punish those responsible.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: Involuntarily discharged from the Army, a special forces sergeant lands a contract with a private underground military force. When his very first assignment goes awry, the elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: Quan is a humble London businessman whose long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love -- his teenage daughter -- dies in a senseless act of politically motivated terrorism. His relentless search to find the terrorists leads to a cat-and-mouse conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to the identities of the elusive killers.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: In a future world, humans share aspects of their lives with companion robots called Mechas. But when an advanced prototype robot child named David is programmed to show unconditional love, his human family isn't prepared for the consequences.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
programme.desc: When mysterious giant robots begin attacking the streets of New York City, intrepid reporter Polly Perkins is on the story and enlists the aid of ace aviator and old flame Joseph 'Sky Captain' Sullivan.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Cradle of Life
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Tennessee Sheriff Buford Pusser (Joe Don Baker) carries a big stick after thugs beat him up and kill his wife (Elizabeth Hartman).

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When an inner-city Detroit foster mother (Fionnula Flanagan) is murdered in a botched holdup, four of her now-grown adopted children suspect it was no random killing. Rising musician Jack (Garrett Hedlund), former-Marine Angel (Tyrese Gibson), hotheaded hockey player Bobby (Mark Wahlberg) and settled-down husband and father Jeremiah (Andr Benjamin) go on the hunt for neighborhood criminal kingpin Victor Sweet (Chiwetel Ejiofor) while being trailed themselves by the local beat cops.

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A turf battle between New York City street gangs that rages from Coney Island to the Bronx. The Warriors are mistakenly fingered for the killing of a gang leader. Soon they have every gang in the city out to get revenge, and they must make their way across the city to their own turf.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross (Laura Linney) is sent by her father-in-law, mogul R.B. Travis (Joe Don Baker), to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly (Ernie Hudson), Ross and a mismatched search party -- including primatologist Dr. Peter Elliot (Dylan Walsh), treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka (Tim Curry) and a gorilla -- discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Random Hearts
programme.desc: A congresswoman and a cop investigate their spouses's relationship when they are killed in a plane crash.

programme.title: Thunderheart
programme.desc: An FBI agent is sent to a South Dakota indian reservation to capture a radical native American protester.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: An emotionally charged war story that pits Soviet soldiers against Afghan rebels.

programme.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: When the idealistic young Jefferson Smith (James Stewart) winds up appointed to the United States Senate, he gains the mentorship of Senator Joseph Paine (Claude Rains). However, Paine isn't as noble as his reputation would indicate, and he becomes involved in a scheme to discredit Smith, who wants to build a boys' campsite where a more lucrative project could go. Determined to stand up against Paine and his corrupt peers, Smith takes his case to the Senate floor.

programme.title: On the Waterfront
programme.desc: Dockworker Terry Malloy (Marlon Brando) had been an up-and-coming boxer until powerful local mob boss Johnny Friendly (Lee J. Cobb) persuaded him to throw a fight. When a longshoreman is murdered before he can testify about Friendly's control of the Hoboken waterfront, Terry teams up with the dead man's sister Edie (Eva Marie Saint) and the streetwise priest Father Barry (Karl Malden) to testify himself, against the advice of Friendly's lawyer, Terry's older brother Charley (Rod Steiger).

programme.title: You Were Never Lovelier
programme.desc: Bob Davis (Fred Astaire), an American dancer in Buenos Aires, Argentina, finds himself desperate for work after losing all his money. He takes a gig at a wedding, hoping to impress the bride's father, Eduardo Acua (Adolphe Menjou), a local club owner who has decreed that his daughters must marry in order of age. Eduardo eventually agrees to allow Bob to perform at his club, but only under the condition that he play suitor to his second-oldest daughter, the beautiful Maria (Rita Hayworth).

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Daddys Home
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they'll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy's addicted to tattling, and Jan's hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: The New Daughter
programme.desc: A single father (Kevin Costner) is puzzled by his daughter's (Ivana Baquero) weird behavior, which begins soon after he moves his family to a secluded woodland home.

programme.title: The Unborn
programme.desc: Plagued by nightmares and visitations from tortured ghosts, Casey Beldon turns to a spiritual adviser named Sendak for help. They discover a family curse that dates back to Nazi Germany: an evil spirit that can take over the body of anyone and is getting stronger with each possession, as it tries to gain full entrance to this world.

programme.title: Dragonfly
programme.desc: When a loved one dies, are they gone forever? As head of emergency services for Chicago Memorial Hospital, Dr. Joe Darrow (Kevin Costner) is a respected expert in trauma and triage. But his professional knowledge provides little comfort when tragedy claims the life of his wife. A doctor herself, Emily Darrow (Susanna Thompson) was on a medical mercy mission when she died in a bus accident on a remote mountain road in Venezuela. Joe starts believing his wife is trying to communicate with him.

programme.title: Sanctum
programme.desc: Though the South Pacific's Esa-ala Caves are some of the least-accessible on Earth, expert diver Frank McGuire (Richard Roxburgh) has explored them for months. On one such expedition, Frank is joined by his teenage son, Josh (Rhys Wakefield), and financier Carl Hurley (Ioan Gruffudd). When a flash flood cuts off their exit, they are caught in a life-or-death situation. With supplies dwindling, the divers must navigate a treacherous labyrinth to find a new escape route or die in the process.

programme.title: Kill Switch
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer is ravaging Memphis, Tenn., by murdering young women, and Detective Jacob Stillwell (Steven Seagal) is on the case. Known as the resident tough cop due to his aggressive tactics, he gets knocked sideways when his girlfriend becomes one of the murder victims. With his partner, Storm Anderson (Chris Thomas King), in tow, Jacob casts the rules aside and infiltrates the seedy criminal underworld of the city looking to avenge his lover's death and put an end to the killings.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: As a mercenary, John Seeger (Steven Seagal) has a reputation that precedes him. That's why he's being blackmailed into performing a risky job: breaking the son of a wealthy arms dealer out of a South African prison. With his friends taken hostage, Seeger agrees to do the deed -- but finds out too late that he's been double-crossed. Not one who likes being taken for a fool, Seeger hatches an elaborate plan to get even that will make the prison break look like capture the flag.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A former thief (Nicolas Cage) has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner (Josh Lucas) kidnaps his daughter and locks her in a cab.

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Fast-talking diamond dealer Kyle Miller (Nicolas Cage) and his wife, Sarah (Nicole Kidman), live the good life in a beautiful home surrounded by thick woods. Their dream life turns into a nightmare when violent thieves, led by Elias (Ben Mendelsohn), invade their home disguised as police officers. With Kyle and Sarah now frightened captives, Kyle knows he must use every negotiating trick in his book, for once Elias and his men get what they want, the Millers will likely be killed.

programme.title: 3.5th Period (English Dubbed)
programme.desc: In Shin-ha High School, there's a secret hidden between the 3rd and 4th periods. It's the existence of a 3.5th period where time flows ten times slower, turning 10 minutes into 100. Baek Ah-jin accidentally enters the 3.5th period and meets Kang Da-won, a male student trapped there. To help Da-won escape from the 3.5th period, Ah-jin unravels the mysteries hidden there. However, there are those who hinder their efforts and strive to conceal the 3.5th period. What secrets are hidden in Shin-ha High School's 3.5th period? Will Da-won successfully escape and reunite with Ah-jin?

programme.title: When Romance Meets Destiny (English Dubbed)
programme.desc: Two brothers, Kwang-Sik and Kwang-Tae, have very different attitudes toward women. Kwang-Sik is extremely shy and can't say a word to a woman. But Kwang-Tae is a playboy who just sleeps around. One day, Kwang-Sik meets Yoon-Kyung for the first time in seven years and he tries to confess his feelings to her, in his own way. Similarly, Kwang-Tae meets Kyung-Jae during a marathon and he tries his own ways on her.At first Kwang-Sik still finds it very difficult to even talk to Yoon-Kyung and Kwang-Tae thinks of Kyung-Jae as yet another temporary conquest, but in each case something changes in the brothers. Will they be able to love this time?

programme.desc: A new bank opens and Banker Hamilton hires a slow-witted gunman to guard the safe. When some of the gunman's old outlaw friends arrive in town they propose he join them in robbing the bank.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark tries to play Cupid between Lucas and a stranger who arrives in North Fork, the girl's older brothers accuse him of trifling with her affections and challenge him to fight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark are returning from a big cattle sale when the stage is robbed by three outlaws. Lucas, desperate to recover the money that was stolen, is determined to pursue the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas gets in trouble when he accuses the foreman of a neighboring ranch of rustling some of his cattle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Argentine family moves to North Fork. The townspeople are unfriendly to them, making fun of their clothing and customs. The Argentinean adult immigrant is openly hostile in return.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark find themselves exposed to anthrax after they adopt a stray horse whose owner has been killed in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous gunfighter marries and decides to retire. He and his wife settle down in North Fork and open a store, but three outlaws arrive in town looking to best him in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas McCain's, a traveling photographer, comes to North Fork plying his trade. When a murder is committed, the photographer is accused of the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townsfolk of North Fork decide to give a young couple a shivaree celebration. When the drunken crowd gets out of hand and roughs up the bride-to-be, the young groom challenges them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a young boy from Brooklyn is accused of murder, Mark, believing the boy's claim of innocence, hides him until he can find the real killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sid Fallon tries to blackmail a former gambler into allowing him to use her boarding house as a gambling hall.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: Sgt. Garcia's life is endangered when he is accused of stealing the king of Spain's gold.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: An impostor tax collector orders that debtors be thrown in jail.

programme.desc: After escaping a lynch mob, Gar Davis (Clint Walker) disguises himself in a dead man's clothes and stumbles upon a farm. programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: Don Diego learns that a visiting Mexican woman is actually an agent for the Eagle.

programme.title: Death Valley Days

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.desc: A Navy officer mapping the Missouri River encounters a struggle between Indians and the Army.

programme.desc: A prospector loses his wagon and all of his money.

Soon the sinister little man is on the trail of Butch, Postmaster P. and Stray Bullet, along with Mack Daddy himself.

Although she and her friends quickly go from rags to riches, they discover that the gold belongs to someone else: an evil leprechaun (Warwick Davis) who has returned from hell to claim his treasure. Speaking in riddles and rhymes, the demon stalks his victims with ruthless determination -- and scores some excellent pot along the way.

programme.title: Golden Time Ep.17
programme.desc: The hospital staff soon learns the shocking truththat Jaein is the chairman's granddaughter. At the same time, an emergency audit is launched by the Ministry of Health and Welfare. With Daeje still unconscious, calls rise to convene a board meeting to determine who will lead the hospital in his absence, leaving Geumnyeo deep in deliberation.

programme.title: Golden Time Ep.18
programme.desc: With only interns left staffing the emergency room, a pregnant woman involved in a traffic accident is rushed in after going into cardiac arrest, leaving the interns paralyzed by a life-or-death decision. Meanwhile, as Daeje remains unconscious, a board meeting is convened to discuss the appointment of an interim chairperson.

programme.title: Golden Time Ep.19
programme.desc: Appointed as interim chairperson, Jaein struggles to address the hospital's most urgent issues, only to face resistance and noncooperation from multiple departments. At the same time, a Health Insurance Review and Assessment Service officer demands objective evidence from Inhyuk and Minwoo to justify the emergency drug administration.

programme.title: Golden Time Ep.20
programme.desc: When the pregnant patient falls into another critical emergency, Minwoo and Inhyuk rush in to treat herbut her condition rapidly deteriorates to a perilous state. Meanwhile, government helicopter support falls through, and a cascade of internal crises begins to close in on Jaein.

programme.title: Golden Time Ep.21
programme.desc: Although helicopter support from the Ministry of Health falls through, discussions begin on using aircraft from the National Fire Agency. Frustrated by the officials' lack of cooperation, Inhyuk grows increasingly exasperated. Meanwhile, several department chiefs follow Seheon's junior out for a yacht outingonly to be involved in a serious traffic accident.

programme.title: Golden Time Ep.22
programme.desc: As the department heads argue over who should operate on a critically injured patient, Minwoo bluntly asks whether they should call Professor Choi Inhyuk. While everyone stares in disbelief, the patient is swiftly transferred to the operating room. Elsewhere, the interns submit applications to the departments they hope to join.

programme.title: Goddess of Fire Ep.14
programme.desc: After defeating Yukdo, Jeongi meets Gangcheon's gaze with quiet confidence, leaving him visibly shaken when he learns that her family name is Yu. Meanwhile, the Chief Scholar presents Gwanghae with a vessel he claims was a bribe from Royal Consort Inbin. Seeking the truth, Gwanghae visits the royal artisan Mun Saseung to confirm whether the piece was made at the Bunwonjust as Jeongi steps inside.

programme.title: Goddess of Fire Ep.15
programme.desc: Unable to bring herself to shatter Euldam's vessel, Jeongi trembles before Gangcheon until Gwanghae arrives to intervene. Determined to prove himself superior to Mun Saseung, Yukdo demands a chance from Gangcheon. Jeongi agrees to assist Mun Saseung in crafting the ceremonial vessels for the Giroyeon banquet. Watching Gwanghae's special concern for Jeongi, Taedo questions why she matters to him so deeply.

programme.title: Goddess of Fire Ep.16
programme.desc: As Jeongi explains the shape of a wine cup, Gwanghae finds his gaze drawn to her lips and abruptly excuses himself, flustered by his own reaction. Later, Gangcheon is stunned to discover Euldam's pottery at the merchant guild and asks Hwa-ryeong whether Jeongi is truly Euldam's daughter. Taedo quietly observes Jeongi and Gwanghae sitting side by side before the kiln. On the day of the Giroyeon banquet, Jeongi grows increasingly anxious when the vessels fail to arrive at the hall.

programme.title: Goddess of Fire Ep.17
programme.desc: Upon discovering that Jeongi is Euldam's daughter, Gangcheon expels her from the Bunwon workshop. In front of everyone, Mun Saseung kneels and begs Gangcheon to spare her. When Hwa-ryeong declares that she will live solely to defeat Jeongi, Taedo is left shaken. Soon after, Jeongi is ordered to craft a porcelain vase as a birthday gift for Royal Consort Inbin, and Gwanghae promises to support her with everything he has.

programme.title: Goddess of Fire Ep.18
programme.desc: Startled by the sound of vases shattering inside the kiln, Jeongi peers inside and suddenly collapses. Hearing that Jeongi had been guarding the kiln alone, Gwanghae turns pale and desperately searches for her. Taedo watches over the unconscious Jeongi with quiet anguish. Seeing Jeongi injured, her eyesight damaged, Gwanghae is overcome with painyet Jeongi asks only to be allowed back into the Bunwon.

programme.title: Goddess of Fire Ep.19
programme.desc: Claiming she has no lingering attachment, Jeongi leaves the Bunwon behind, and Gwanghae watches her go in hollow disbelief. After returning to her former home, Jeongi and Taedo are suddenly seized by military officers, who drag Taedo away. Gwanghae pleads with Inbin to release him, insisting that Taedo once served as his personal guard. Awakened by her mother Yeonok's voice, Jeongi rises and walks toward the kiln

programme.title: Do You Like Brahms? Ep.1

She will face new challenges like being much older than all her peers and not having the support of her family. See what happens when Song Ah meets the successful pianist Joon Young.

programme.title: Do You Like Brahms? Ep.2

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 1 (ME1)-After a three-year hiatus, the prestigious EPT Monte Carlo 5,000 Main Event returns in spectacular fashion. Day 2 brings together poker's biggest names, including high-stakes specialist Patrik Antonius, World Champion Koray Aldemir, Italian ace Mustapha Kanit, and trailblazing two-time EPT champion Victoria Coren-Mitchell. The battle for poker immortality begins.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 2 (ME2)-Tension mounts as the money bubble approaches in Monte Carlo's Main Event. With 159 players set to cash for at least 8,690, every decision matters. EPT legends Patrik Antonius and Davidi Kitai command the feature table while 2019 PSPC champion Ramon Colillas holds the chip lead. Who will survive the bubble and who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 3 (ME3)-The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Galle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna at the feature table. With real money now guaranteed, the gloves come off.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 4 (ME4)-PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables. With the finish line in sight, who has what it takes to keep their championship dreams alive?

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Colorado Mule Deer with Brody Henderson
programme.desc: In the rugged terrain of central Colorado, Steven Rinella and his friend Brody Henderson set out to hunt mule deer amidst aspen groves and sagebrush. Navigating unseasonably warm November weather, they face challenges in tracking down the elusive deer as the heat pushes the animals into cooler, shaded areas. After several attempts, including a close encounter thwarted by coyotes, the duo finally spots a promising buck.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: The Hanging Tree: Afognak Island Elk
programme.desc: Amidst the dense fog and relentless rain of Afognak Island, Steve and Remi embark on a challenging elk hunt, navigating rugged terrain and the constant presence of brown bears. As visibility dwindles and the weather worsens, they push forward in one of the most unpredictable environments. It's a hunt that demands resilience, patience, and a deep respect for the wilderness.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve heads to the interior of Alaska with his friends Doug Duren and Mark Kenyon for an adventure amidst.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Continuing their adventure in Alaska's interior, Steve, Doug, and Mark push deeper into the caribou migration. With Doug still hoping to take his first bull, the team sets up on a high ridge, watching caribou stream across the landscape. They face grizzly bears, dense fog, and the ever-changing weather of the Alaskan wilderness. As the days pass, they work together to intercept a herd of caribou, knowing their window could close.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In this episode, Steven Rinella steps out of the field and into the kitchen to showcase some of his favorite.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve heads to the panhandle of Idaho to join wildlife biologist and dedicated houndsman Bart George for a mountain lion hunt. Bruce Dunkin, Bart's mentor and hunting buddy, joins the crew as they attempt to cut a cat's track and let the dogs loose for a hunt in the deep timber of the Idaho mountains.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and Evan Hafer head into Southeast Alaska's coastal rainforest to hunt Sitka black-tailed deer.

programme.title: MeatEater

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella joins Jean-Paul Bourgeois and Ronnie Collins in Louisiana Mississippi Delta for a duck hunt. Surrounded by the unique landscape of the Delta, they target multiple duck species. After a successful hunt, the team returns to camp, where Jean-Paul prepares a traditional Cajun meal featuring the day catch. Experience the cultural tradition of turning fresh game into flavorful, local dishes like duck gumbo and crawfish boil.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella, Ryan Callahan, and Danny Bolton travel to Hawaii's Big Island for a unique hunt. They stalk feral sheep in the lush mountainsides and target wild hogs on a coffee plantation, using the animals' movements through macadamia groves to their advantage. The episode highlights Hawaii's blend of hunting and conservation, ending with a Hawaiian-style feast featuring the fresh game they harvested.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.sub-title: Fly Shop Tour - "Our 2500 Mile ROAD TRIP Begins
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Destination Dive
programme.sub-title: Destination Dive - "Groups working to restore our vital ecosystems
programme.desc: We highlight organizations and programs making a difference in the Florida Keys. Learn how they help protect and restore these vital ecosystems.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Exploring New York City's Hidden Culinary Gems: Cooking Goat Brains, Lobster & MORE
programme.desc: New. York. City. That's where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredientsfrom sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan's kitchen.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.sub-title: Hard Truths of Conservation - "The hunting heritage of South Africa
programme.desc: South Africa offers an incredible insight into the hunter and gatherer history of ancestors. Dan Cabela re-traces the footsteps of humanity's forefathers and explores how modern, private ownership of land has helped re-balance the human relationship with nature.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.sub-title: The Green Way Outdoors - "The Snakehead Fish
programme.desc: Kyle Green and Jeff Hutchinson head to Maryland to bow-fish for an invasive, toothy fish called the snakehead. They learn how this fish, a native of Asia, made its way to the United States. They also learn from the locals, despite its appearance, it is one tasty fish.

programme.title: Fox Hollow Outdoors
programme.desc: Michael and Larken Letchworth set out on a new adventure, exploring food fishing and the great outdoors. This father son duo are making memories that will last a lifetime and will forever be etched in the digital world.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: Host Ryan McVinney takes Boat Trader fans on an indepth exploration of Florida flats fishing deep in the backcountry of Islamorada. Featuring Captain Eric Lund, a Wall Street Broker turned backcountry fishing guide, this episode reveals the key design features of the world's best flats skiffs and how they are built for targeting some of the most exciting sportfish species on the planet. Also, covered are bay boats and their versatility for families exploring Florida's coastal waterways, along with a detailed study of fish species and wildlife in the region. Some of the area's most beautiful and secret locales show why Islamorada has earned the nickname of the Sportfish Capital of The World.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.sub-title: Stomping Grounds - "Alaska's Massive Marvels: A Boating Expedition through America's Last Frontier Pt 1
programme.desc: From battling towering 12-foot waves in the Gulf of Alaska, to reeling in colossal 200 lb. halibut, they discover firsthand the rugged beauty of America's 49th state. This episode highlights Lindell Yachts as a top builder of rugged offshore sportfishing yachts, as well as Radon Boats as great pilothouse fishing and guide boats.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: In this episode of Goin' Coastal, Captain Josh and Anna Calhoon set out for some fun Flounder fishing. They enjoy a delicious hook & cook served up fresh from their day at AJ's!

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Overview: East Alton, Illinois is the home of Winchester Ammunition and the manufacturing home of the shotshell plants that build and produce millions of rounds of ammo for hunters, sport shooters, military and law enforcement. Get an unprecedented inside look at the birth cycle of a shotshell inside the walls of Winchester. From hull to primer, shot to wad and packaging to shipping, watch how the most legendary and successful ammunition brand in the world comes to is born and built.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: While releasing a defeated tarpon healthy after an epic battle is the ultimate victory, everything else is measured in heartbreak and degrees of failure. For Justin, putting Ethan on his first silver king requires patience and a tasty diversion by a local chef.

programme.title: Jeff Allen
programme.desc: Jeff Allen's humorous third special is another smash-hit. In this Dry Bar Comedy special, Jeff chronicles his relationships with his empty-nester wife, house-mate father-in-law, and sixty-seven-year-old body. He also talks about how with all his kids gone, his wife is trying to fix him.

programme.title: Daniel Eachus
programme.desc: Daniel Eachus talks about weird jobs, strange fears, and how to prank restaurants all through the lens of being the lifelong skinny guy.

programme.title: Cam Bertrand
programme.desc: Cam shares his outlook on relationships and life through the eyes of a 23-year-old in a way that everyone can relate to. Bringing high energy and witty style that appeals to a wide demographic.

programme.title: Bill Boronkay
programme.desc: Sarcastic and self-deprecating, Bill Boronkay jokes about being too ugly to work for ESPN, dating out of his tax bracket, and how society is centered around parents.

programme.title: Alex Velluto
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named Best of Fest at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted Best Comedian by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special Alex Velluto: Spurious is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Key Lewis
programme.sub-title: Half Black, Half White, Looks Mexican
programme.desc: Sacramento California born Key Lewis is a high energy, improvisational, storytelling, multiple-personality nutcase! His love for the people and hunger for the stage is his undying motivation. His comedic stories about his interracial childhood, family, and unusual views on relationships, make Key simply a joy to watch. His ability to improvise and interact with all types of crowds makes this up and coming comic and actor one to look out for. Key Lewis has appeared on Marlon Wayans TBSs Funniest Wins, Starz Networks StaannDup, Kevin Harts One Mic Stand as well as Bill Bellamys Whos Got Jokes! Key says, chase your dream, always know your audience dont act funny, be funny... dont worry about the quantity of your material but the quality the sooner you create a relationship with your crowd, the better you will be. Television: Bill Bellamys Whos Got Jokes on TVONE. BETS One Mic Stand Hosted by Kevin Hart. Starz Network Comedy Series called StaannDup, Marlon Wayans TBSs Funniest Wins! Competitions: Winner of the 2013 Rocky Mountain Laugh Off, Finalist in the 2010 Bay Area Black Comedy Competition, Semi-Finalist 2009 San Francisco International Comedy Competition, a Semi-Finalist in the 2008 Boston Comedy Festival, 2007 Seattle International Comedy Competition Finalist, Shades of Laughs Portland Oregon Winner, TVONE Bill Bellamys Who Got Jokes Contestant. Radio: Improv work with FM Morning Shows (Top 40 Radio): KSFM 102.5 (Sacramento, CA), KWOD 106.5 (Sacramento, CA) KWIN 97.7 Stockton/Lodi, CA, Mix 107.9 Salt Lake City UT (Is It Racist Segment) & The Man Panel. Concerts/Festivals: Opened for Jon B. and Keysha Cole, Taste Of Tacoma, & Bite Of Seattle Fountain Stage 5 Years Running! Key Lewis has worked with the likes of Kevin Hart, Pablo Francisco, Sam Bam, Alonzo Bodden, Jay London, Gabriel Iglesias, Brooks McBeth, Tommy Davidson, Katt Williams, De-Ray Davis, Andrew Norelli, Lonnie Love, Jeff Garcia, Damon Wayans, Joey Diaz, Guy Torry, Darren Carter, Paul Mooney, Kermet Apio and many more.

programme.title: Joe Devito
programme.desc: Joe DeVito's dead-on timing and unexpected twists make him a favorite at comedy clubs across the USA. His TV appearances include The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central, Comics Unleashed, and AXStv's Gotham Comedy Live. He's also a regular on TV news panels, finding the funny in pop culture and current events. Joe's albums First Date with Joe DeVito and Three's Comedy are in regular rotation on SiriusXM radio.

programme.title: Andrew Hobbs
programme.desc: Have you ever, as an adult, been bullied by a healthcare professional or popular middle school girl? Andrew has. The comedy of Andrew Hobbs encapsulates the bizarre awkwardness of belated maturity and his attempts to appear in control. Andrew will have you rolling with laughter as he twists a narrative of humor and heart from his own life experiences and observations. His comedy has been featured in comedy festivals across the country. He has been perfecting his craft since childhood and throughout adulthood.

programme.title: Michael Joiner
programme.desc: Michaels brand of comedy is, in a word, familiar. Not in the sense that youve heard it before, but more so that he knows you and you know him. He speaks about the things you are thinking in a way that sounds so much like your inner voice it is astounding. His effortless delivery will resonate with you. Michael is the 1st Place winner of the Hollywood Improv's "FUNNIEST COMIC IN L.A." 2008, and 2010 Christian Music Hall of Fame "COMEDIAN OF THE YEAR" nominee, Joiner has attracted wide praise for his routines that blend a sarcastic edginess with a devotion to clean humor. Joiner has headlined at The LA AREA Improvs, The Funny Bone, The Ice House and other comedy clubs across the country while also performing at colleges and sold out Clean Comedy Concerts nationwide. He's also written for "The Tonight Show With Jay Leno." He has been performing nationwide for over 25 years and is rated one of the nation's funniest Clean Stand-up Comedians. The TV Guide Network calls Michael "One of the funniest, most original, stand up Comedians working today!" In 2006, Michael was one out of only four Comedians chosen worldwide to star in the top selling DVD, "The Clean Stand Up Comedy Tour." Unlike many Comedians who stick to their rehearsed script, Michael's stand up comedy show includes some of the most clever, hilarious improv and audience interaction you will ever experience.

programme.title: Seth Tippetts
programme.desc: Get to know Seth from the chest down. He's big, he's tall, but most of all he's hilarious. Check out this Utah-raised, clean, and semi-professional comedian today!

programme.title: Card Sharks
programme.desc: This show from legendary Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions features two contestants trying to predict answers to survey questions for the opportunity to play a game with oversized playing cards for a chance to win cash. One contestant guesses how many people (out of 100) gave a certain answer to a question and the other contestant then guesses if the number is higher or lower than the opponent's guess. The winning contestant then faces a row of cards and must determine if each succeeding card is higher or lower than the one that precedes it. The contestant who wins two out of three games wins the match and plays the bonus round, called Money Cards. The Money Cards round is similar to the card game in the main game but with three levels of cards instead of one row. The contestant is given $200 at the beginning of Money Cards and wagers any or all of that money when guessing if the cards will be higher or lower than the previous one. A perfect round could earn the contestant $28,800.

programme.title: Dracula
programme.desc: A man washes ashore in England after a shipwreck and is found by Mina Van Helsing (Jan Francis). The man introduces himself as Count Dracula (Frank Langella) of Transylvania, and proceeds to integrate himself into the lives of Mina and her friend Lucy Seward (Kate Nelligan). However, when Mina dies and her father, Prof. Van Helsing (Laurence Olivier), attributes her death to a vampire, evidence indicates that Count Dracula is the monster, and Lucy is his next target.

programme.title: Dracula
programme.desc: Soon after beginning work for Conde Dracula (Carlos Villarias), the clerk Renfield (Pablo Alvarez Rubio) learns that his employer is, in fact, a vampire who lives on human blood. Now under Dracula's spell, Renfield helps his master travel to London, where the vampire takes another victim (Carmen Guerrero). Dracula also has eyes on the lovely Eva (Lupita Tovar), but her fianc, Juan Harker (Barry Norton), and a wise professor named Van Helsing (Eduardo Arozamena) seek to stop him.

programme.title: Dracula's Daughter
programme.desc: Although Count Dracula was destroyed by Van Helsing (Edward Van Sloan), who is now being tried for his murder, Dracula's daughter, the Countess Marya Zaleska (Gloria Holden), is still alive -- and her father's death has brought her no closer to eradicating her vampiric thirst for blood. When attempts to free herself of the disease fail, she turns to psychiatrist Dr. Garth (Otto Kruger) for assistance, but soon finds herself struggling with the desire to make him one of the undead as well.

programme.title: The Evil of Frankenstein

programme.title: The Sandbox
programme.desc: The Sandbox is where our favorite Baby Einstein characters gather to play, problem-solve and have fun. Each five-minute episode explores an area of curiosity relevant to our 2-4 year old audience.Since the four weathered planks of wood that make up the structure of their sandbox are no obstacles for their imaginations, the entire universe is available to them for each new adventure.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby's First Sounds: Discoveries for Little Ears
programme.desc: Perhaps the sweetest sounds you'll ever hear are the babbles and coos that one day become ma-ma, da-da and I love you. Besides being music to your ears, these baby steps of language change everything as your little one discovers an exciting, powerful new way of relating to the world! Baby's First Sounds invites both of you to share these memorable moments: those precious ''firsts'' that come around once in your baby's lifetime.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Einstein: Let's Learn Signs: Family and Home
programme.desc: Discover sign language along with your favorite Baby Einstein Characters! Learn how to sign the names of common things from different objects found at home and outside, family, and even your very own neighborhood through repetition and narration. Real-life images of toys and objects along with gentle melodies engage viewers as they learn a variety of different signs.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby's First Moves: Get Up and Go
programme.desc: Within the first year of babies' lives, their physical development begins to kick into high gear as they explore ways to physically interact with the world around them. BABY'S FIRST MOVES is a joyful celebration of their movement milestones -- including first steps, clapping, jumping, dancing and more.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Isn't the world exciting?! Learn about things found in nature like flowers, grass, trees, and leaves with real-life footage and narration. Discover words and activities about playtime and friendship.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Da Vinci: From Head to Toe
programme.desc: From the day their eyes open, babies begin to observe new things around the world and about themselves. Baby Da Vinci From Head to Toe presents them with a playful and interactive introduction to the human body in three languages -- English, Spanish, and French. With a whimsical blend of adorable puppets, real children and animals and famous works of art, this captivating program also features upbeat classical music.

programme.title: Snowberry and Seven Berrykins
programme.desc: The Baby Berrykins are enthralled by a fairytale that Blueberry reads to them for Story Time. She envisions a small, simple productionuntil she hears about a gigantic production of Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins that's a smash hit in Berry Big City. She becomes convinced that unless she does the same play in the same grand scale, she'll be the laughing stock of the berry bitty theatrical world! Plum races the play into production.

programme.title: Berryella and Prince Berry Charming
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a Story Time On Stage musical play for the Berrykin kids: Berryella and Prince Berry Charming, directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother. Orange is the stage manager, assisted by stagehands Berrykin Ed and Berrykin Earl. They've barely begun when they face their first problem: the Berrykin who was supposed to play Prince Charming has broken his toe and must bow out of the production!

programme.title: The Littlest Berrykin
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, The Littlest Berrykin, into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. But before leaving, they must choose which of their three princesses (played by Lemon, Raspberry and Strawberry in royal gowns) will rule the kingdom.

programme.title: The Berry Big Relay Race
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the retrieve part of the activityas soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search. Orange finds Strawberry, Plum and Raspberry in Lemon's salon, getting their hair and nails done, but something starts going terribly wrong with the appliances.

programme.title: Sid the Weatherman

programme.title: Special Mom Day Meal
programme.desc: When Sid smells the French toast and his stomach growls, he wonders if his stomach is trying to talk to him. When Sid and his friends investigate at school, they discover that the stomach makes noise when it's getting ready for digestion.

programme.title: The Berry Best Treasure
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the caf, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of controllife in Berry Bitty City is impossible! Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! She describes a game where the girls divide into two teams, and each team creates fun written clues for the other that lead to funny objects the girls must collect.

programme.title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest! Rallied by a sense of competition and adventure, the girls divide into three groups and set up tentseach convinced they will be the bravest group. They each come up with diverting activities to distract themselves.

programme.desc: Ling Ling takes Rainbow Ruby to Ellie's cabin where she meets mischievous baby stars that fell from the sky. The baby stars were playing together, got separated from their mother and ended up in Rainbow Village. // Kiki is extremely upset because the jewel Prince Frederick gave her as a gift broke. The friends try to glue the broken pieces together but it doesn't work. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a jewelry designer and tries designing jewelry with the broken pieces.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Ruby's Ranger Adventure // The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: When Ruby and Choco arrive at the village, they find a very worried looking Ling Ling. Gina, Ellie, and Thunderbell went camping in Rainbow Forest but they saw a monster in the forest, got scared and had to run away. // Ruby is struggling to make a doll with her dad. Ruby and Choco get their suitcase and as Ruby swings her umbrella, there they are, in front of Rainbow fountain. Mayor Ling Ling tells her that today is the day of Princess Kiki's ballet performance.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby is looking at shoes that are now too small for her but she is unwilling to throw away. Ling Ling is worried about Thunderbell. His scooter broke so he is not able to carry out his work as a mail carrier. // Gina calls Rainbow Ruby because today is the day to show their appreciation to Mayor Ling Ling. It took a long time for the village friends to prepare an amazing painting for the mayor. Unfortunately, Thunderbell accidentally destroyed the painting while delivering it.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: At Your Service // A Hard Rain
programme.desc: There is a new menu at the restaurant, which is very popular. There is a long line in front of the restaurant but there weren't enough staff members to serve the villagers the food. Rainbow Ruby turns into a waitress using her magic suitcase and serve tables kindly. // Rainbow Village is full of marbles. The marbles that Rainbow Ruby spilled in her room poured down into the village from up above the sky! Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a paramedic.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Gina, Thunderbell, and Choco try to cheer Jessy up but their efforts are of no use. While talking to Mayor Ling Ling, Rainbow Ruby realizes that today is the day that Jessy first arrived in Rainbow Village! Jessy was upset that her friends forgot such a meaningful day to her. // Ling Ling has caught a bad cold and was sneezing all over the place. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase and transforms into a doctor and cares for him.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Singing in the Rain // Mail Carrier Mayhem
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried that the villagers are all in low spirits. Ruby thinks of fun games to play but the villagers say that they have already played all of the games too many times. Rainbow Ruby transforms into a singer. // Ling Ling is worried because of the "Secret Present Swapping Party" that Thunderbell is preparing. Thunderbell forgot to send out the invitations. Rainbow Ruby turns into a mail carrier and delivers the invitations.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Going Golfing // Case of the Stolen Spectacles
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that a Rainbow Ball Tournament is about to start soon but he is worried because the field is covered with pokey pods. Thunderbell, Ellie, and Gina are trying to pick them up and clear the field but it is not easy since the pokey pods are so spikey. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that he lost his glasses. Then Ellie tells her she lost her needles, Gina her hat, and Thunderbell his wheels. Who could have taken away all these things?

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Up in the Air // AdDRESSing the Problem
programme.desc: Ling Ling is waiting for Rainbow Ruby, looking worried. It turns out that Mr. Sloth's best friend Chirpee is depressed. Chirpee wants to fly high but is struggling due to his small wings and lack of means to learn how to fly. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that the dress that the paper doll Paige was planning to wear to Kiki's dance party is torn. Paige very much wants to go to the party but she cannot go without a dress.

programme.sub-title: Ruby's Ranger Adventure // The Show Must Go On

programme.desc: The ZooMoo team learn about animals that live above the snow line.

programme.title: ZooMoo

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: A Gift for Molly // Lights, Camera, Action!
programme.desc: It's Mudder's Day-everyone's favourite day of the year! The Stunt Park is filled with mud, and the whole town gets to drive through it. But Rev can't join them until he gets a gift for his Mom...and the stores are all closed for the festivities! // After Bo shows off his action-hero moves, Rev wants him to star in his film. Bu Bo freezes with stage fright as soon as Rev turns the camera on! Bo wants to be brave and come through for his friends, but how can he overcome his fear?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Hide & Go Bentley // T'was the Trek Before Christmas
programme.desc: Rev and Rumble teach Bentley the puppy to play Hide and Seek! At first the pup doesn't get it...but soon Bentley's hiding so well, they can't find him! Can Rumble use Bentley's instincts to help them track down their puppy pal? // A big winter storm is headed for town...and it's Christmas Eve! What if Santa can't find them through the snow? Rev and the kids round up their own toys and deliver them to all the kids in town-just in case! But can they make it through the storm?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Puppy Love // Fair Weather Ferry // Bumper Ball // Vroom with a View
programme.desc: Rev and Rumble are supposed to spend the day together, but Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy instead, making Rumble jealous. // Rev learns that "old dogs" make great teachers, but even "old dogs" can learn new tricks from young...

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Stuckey the garbage truck dreams of entering the Auto Show, so Rev and the gang clean him up for his big debut. But after saving his friends from danger, Stuckey winds up covered in mud all over again...just in time for his moment in the spotlight! // When Lori only receives two tickets to a movie premiere, her friends compete to see which one of them is her "best friend." But watching her friends compete only makes Lori feel terrible-she'd rather not go to the movie at all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Gear Up Grand Prix // Chinese New Year
programme.desc: As the Gear Up Grand Prix begins, each of the friends runs into problems and must drop out of the race. Soon, slow and steady Lori is the only one left standing! Cheered on by her friends, can Lori and Tipper find the confidence to win? // When the gang puts on a Chinese New Year play, they cast Rumble as the monster. He's a natural! But in rehearsal Rumble begins to worry that he'll be too scary for the audience on opening night. Rumble will need his friends to help him find his roar!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: In Deep Doo-Doo // Rev's Tree Party
programme.desc: When Rev asks to help beautify the town, he insists there's no job too tough! That is...until he finds out he'll be hauling stinky manure. Rev tries to pawn the job off, until Avery tells him the best way to get it done is to just... "doo-doo" it! // When the gang organizes a birthday party for Rev, Avery insists they keep it secret. After hiding Rev's gifts in a tree, they realize the presents are stuck up there and will need to be retrieved-all before Rev figures out what's going on!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Driving Miss Dottie // Follow the Bouncing Wrecking Ball
programme.desc: When Miss Dottie goes missing, Rev and Avery offer to return her to the Rancher's Jamboree! Rumble is star-struck by the show-sheep, until the unlikely duo become friends. Back safe, Miss Dottie takes the stage, this time with her new pal Rumble! // Rev is determined to master Rumble's new wrecking-ball attachment, but things quickly get out of hand when the duo refuse to ask for help. Now they'll need all the help they can get to stop the wayward ball from wrecking all of Fender Bend!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Puppy Love // Fair Weather Ferry // Bumper Ball // Vroom with a View
programme.desc: Rev and Rumble are supposed to spend the day together, but Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy instead, making Rumble jealous. // Rev learns that "old dogs" make great teachers, but even "old dogs" can learn new tricks from young...

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Gear Up Garage Band // First Aid Fun
programme.desc: At band practice, Rumble struggles to control his nervous backfiring, even damaging the instruments by accident! Determined not to give up on the festival, the gang improvises and uses makeshift instruments. They even feature Rumble's nervous twitch! // When Rev and Owen begrudgingly agree to join Bo's First Aid Games, they do everything BUT take the lessons seriously. It isn't long before the boys find out that first aid isn't all fun and games, but it IS totally awesome!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Bo to the Rescue // Ice Cream Team
programme.desc: When Bo messes up on a few rescue missions, he decides to quit Bo's Rescue Hotline. Wanting to help their friend, the gang creates fake emergencies for Bo to solve. But as the friends find out, it takes more than trickery to build self-confidence! // As a heatwave hits Fender Bend, Rev and his friends look forward to Ice Cream Dream Day! But when the ice cream truck breaks down, it's up to the gang to find a way to deliver the tasty treats before they all melt.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev, Rumble and their friends help capture a group of wayward llamas, they each try and claim sole credit for the round up. Rev's parents listen patiently to the elaborate tales, each one starring a different hero, before ruling it a team effort! // When Avery creates a magnetic modification for Rumble, it seems to be the perfect solution. Now Rumble can help them tidy up the Gear Up Garage! But things get complicated when Rumble turns into a super-magnet, attracting all kinds of metal debris!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Fender Bend Friend Day // The Rev & Rumble Fan Club
programme.desc: Rev wants to surprise his friends with a movie celebrating their friendship, so he secretly gathers footage to show they're the best friends ever. When Avery realizes what he's up to, she adds her own clips to the movie - surprising Rev as well! // Owen hosts a virtual review of the gang's adventures with Rev and Rumble, plus all of their awesome gear! He walks his viewers through some of their most memorable moments, from mega stunts to monsters to rescue missions.

programme.title: Tales of Tatonka
programme.desc: Share great laughs and thrilling adventures with Wanji, Nunpa, Yamni and Topa, four daring wolf-cubs. Our four heroes and their friends learn to grow together as a family and discover the world around them.

programme.title: Little Malabar
programme.desc: Little Malabar is very curious and very lucky. He gets to travel into the universe as if it were a big playground, and talk to planets and stars to understand where we come from and how our world took form.

programme.title: Ebb and Flo
programme.desc: The world of Ebb and Flo is seen through Ebb's eyes and Ebb reveals all the emotions grown-ups try to hide. Flo doesn't think of Ebb as a dog, and Ebb doesn't think of Flo as a small human, they just are the best of friends. Until Bird arrives to lovingly disrupt Ebb's world. Ebb and Flo's home is an old boat moored by the beach. Things Couldn't Be Better!

programme.title: Play with Cocobi
programme.desc: Color play, dance, and more. Let's have fun with Cocobi!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: Baby Riki
programme.desc: The show covers all aspects of a child's life from physical well-being to cognitive and soft skills. The musical stories are based around age-appropriate experiences with educational concepts introduced in familiar surroundings and context for infants.

programme.title: Berry and Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, the little snail boy and Dolly, the ladybird are best friends. Together they discover the world around them, while they make new friends with Balthazar the bee, Flutter the butterfly, Stanley the stag-beetle, Leapy the grasshopper, and many others.

programme.title: Doby & Disy: Exploring Journey
programme.desc: Adorable twin brother and sister, Doby & Disy, go on adventures in the magic forest together with their friends. They learn different colors, figures, songs and communication skills by solving various problems on the way.

programme.title: Stella And Sam
programme.desc: As they explore the world in all its seasons, Stella and Sam have wild adventures and comical mishaps. They make friends and discover many things - especially about themselves. If Sam is bold enough to rescue Fred from the sprinkler, then maybe he really can be brave enough to have a sleepover in the backyard tent. Every day is a new adventure, and Stella and Sam share the joy of discovering that they have what it takes to face the biggest adventure of all... growing up.

programme.title: Kids Planet
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed.

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, to help them discover a vast and captivating world, fight their fears and inhibitions, and learn important family values.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Robocar POLI - Try not to hurry & I want to be praised.: School B is late and he is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for the short cut. However every roads are blocked because of roadwork.

programme.title: Non Stop Hits
programme.desc: Fill the day with music and fun with Ice-cream Song, Clap Your Hands, Johny Johny Yes Papa and more!

programme.title: The Adventures of Annie & Ben
programme.sub-title: The Adventures of Annie and Ben - Episode 3
programme.desc: The trio travel by submarine to the underwater city of Atlantis and help a mermaid and her dogfish who have a Giant Squid problem

programme.title: The Adventures of Annie & Ben
programme.sub-title: The Adventures of Annie and Ben - Episode 4
programme.desc: Join Annie, Ben and Mango on a South African jungle safari, where they try to reunite two rhino calves with their mother. Watch them drive through a river, get chased by an angry adult rhino and, in Mango's case, get pulled into a mud bath!

programme.title: Back to Classics
programme.desc: These are all the fun Nursery Rhymes like The Animal Fair, One Two Buckle my Shoe for your babies!

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: This special collection includes Five Little Buses, Johny Johny Yes Papa and more fun melodies.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Here's a collection of gentle melodies featuring Little Boy Blue, Let's go to sleep, and many more.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Gentle songs to help kids sleep peacefully with calm tunes and soothing rhythms.

programme.title: Soothing Melodies
programme.desc: Step into a world of Soothing Melodies like Hey Diddle Diddle, Hush Little Baby, and more!

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Lull your little ones to a peaceful slumber with Shine little Stars, Let's go to sleep and many more

programme.title: Sid the Science Kid
programme.desc: A youngster named Sid, who aspires to a career in stand-up comedy, pitches a morning monologue to his stuffed animals that hinges on a burning question (such as "Why do bananas get brown spots?"), then spends the rest of the day searching for the answer in this hybrid combination of animation and puppetry from The Jim Henson Co., in its first PBS project since "Sesame Street."

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. Ultron's ultimate plan: use all the data/stuff they've stolen to free the newly rebuilt IRON LEGION, destroy the Avengers, and control the world. Tony dons the hastily repaired Hulk Buster Armor and it's on! It's a huge battle as the Avengers try to save their beloved HQ and defeat Ultron. Will they succeed? And, more importantly, can their party be saved after Ultron tries to take down their Tower?The Avengers must now fight one of their own, and they're not sure what to do! Cap and Thor lead the charge, but can't fend off Iron Man and Ultron's Minions. Meanwhile, Black Widow, Hawkeye and Hulk track down a signal that seems to be controlling Iron Man from a castle in the Little Sokovia section of New York. There they fight HYDRA and BARON VON STRUCKER and learn that YELLOWJACKET is the bug that infected Iron Man's suit for Ultron. To help break Iron Man free from Ultron's control, the Avengers call in their own bug...ANT MAN! The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. While preparing for a party at Avengers' Tower, THE AVENGERS (IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA, BLACK WIDOW, HAWKEYE, THOR, HULK and VISION) notice Iron Man acting strangely. When Iron Man volunteers to go out and get more ice, they find it odd: when has Tony every volunteered to get anything? Suddenly, ULTRON appears on a screen: he's taken control of Iron Man! To make matters worse, Ultron takes over all the versions of Iron Man's armor and they fly off!

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RVmaybe they can mod that for their own, knightly use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rollingin THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. Of course I'm the leaderI'm a Richmond.

Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds The Book of Fear. It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her knighmarish power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest as they fight off the Whipperella that they we find out Aaron's true fear the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.
